name: Dirt Jockey: Heavy Equipment Operator
summary: Build big machine muscle as you learn to operate heavy construction equipment that looks, feels, sounds and runs just like the real thing --- from rumbling bulldozers to hard-working dump trucks and high reaching cranes. Once you train to earn your construction licenses, you can start building a huge department store. So get in gear, move dirt and haul butt. Dirt Jockey fulfills the fantasy of operating heavy equipment for kids of all ages.
